dsense.name: goody, goodie
dsense.guideword: informal (fiction: good guy, hero) (非正式用法)

example.eg: In the end, the goody defeated the evil villains.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （小说或影视中的）主人公，好人，英雄

example.eg: Let's go see what kind of goodies they have at the bakery today.
example.egtrans: 让我们一起去看看今天烘培店有哪些好吃的食物。

dsense.name: goody
dsense.guideword: informal (good, hurray) (非正式用法；儿童用语，表示高兴、激动等)

example.eg: Oh goody! My husband has left all the washing-up for me to do!
This story is about Goody Hayes and her husband.
At the end of Lucy's party all the children received a goody bag of sweets and small toys.
example.egtrans: 露西的派对结束后，所有的孩子都收到了一袋糖果和小玩具。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自命清高的人, 假正经的人
